body.name: Shoe Rack 9-Tier Large Shoe Rack for 36-45 Pairs of Shoes, Stackable Shoe Shelf with Removable Drawers for Entryway, Hallway and Closet, Shoe Storage Organizer with Metal Side Hooks
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 30 mins
features: Upgraded Shoe Rack Provides Large Capacity : The upgraded 9-tier shoe rack with its roomy space can house 36-45 pairs of shoes or boosts of all styles. Layers of the shoe shelf in different heights allows to classify your boosts or shoes in different height. Its depth allows to accommodate even shoes up to US size 12! This sturdy shoe rack includes side 5 metal hooks that provide extra space for hanging bags, keys, belts, ties and other accessories. Such a functional tall shoe rack helps maximize your space.

Sturdy Shoe Racks You Will Get : This high-quality shoe rack for closet features rust-proof and thickened metal tubes and an ultra-sturdy reinforced frame that prevents wobbling or collapsing with a full load of shoes on the vertical shoe rack. Non-woven fabric tiers gently hold heels and prevent dents while stopping dust from upper tiers from falling down.

Multi-Functional and Customizable Shoe Organizer : 9-tier shoe rack for entryway boasts a modular design, so you can freely assemble and disassemble it to suit your needs. Detachable tiers allow you to split this free-standing shoe rack into 4- and 5-tier racks or remove drawers to hold boots. Use it as a large shoe rack, separate multimedia storage, or order two shoe organizer racks to build them together as a super large one that can hold all family member’s shoes and keep organized!

Versatile Shoe Shelf with Removeable Drawers : The elaborate design of the drawers can be removed from the closet shoe rack organizer for easy access & allowing you to customize their placement. Due to the extra drawers of the shoes storage rack, you will get other space to storage your socks, hats, magazines, glasses, watches, chargers and some other gadgets.

Easy Assembly Tall Shoe Rack and Sweet Service : Our stackable shoe organizer comes with a detailed instruction manual and all accessories needed. It is easy to assemble without extra tools. Attached are gloves and a hammer as optional tools to protect your hands during installation. Bepatio always stands firmly behind our customers. Contact us right away about any missing or damaged parts or assembly issues and we will resolve them promptly. For any other questions, feel free to contact our after-sales service team. We strive to serve you wholeheartedly.

Sturdy & Multi-Functional and Customizable Shoe Racks Sturdy Shoe Racks Shoe Organizer with Hook Rack Sturdy and Stable Easy Assembly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flexible light-weight shelving suitable for relatively light items
reviews.reviewText: This unit requires a considerable bit of assembly. It's nothing difficult, but there are a lot of parts and it can look a little overwhelming at a glance. The assembly is a bit tedious and some parts can be stubborn. (They include a mallet they say to use when attaching the end connectors, but I found this pretty much useless; I ended up setting each shelf upright once both connectors were attached, then pressing it together with a moderate but continuous force - more or less "leaning" onto the top connector - instead of trying to pound it home with their mallet).Also be aware - there are instructions, but they may be a bit hidden. I found them tucked inside the folded up cloth shelves.Once assembled, it's a pretty good sized shelving unit. It's not quite 6 foot tall and a few inches short of 3 feet wide. There are 9 shelves (and two drawers sized to fit on one of the shelves) for a total of about 280 linear inches of shelf space, with a depth of 10 inches. The metal tube frame is probably pretty sturdy, but note that the shelves are some sort of synthetic fabric stretched over the frame - so it's not going to be suitable for books or other heavy items, or anything that really needs a stable surface to sit on. For the advertised purpose - a shoe rack - it would be fine. It's also good for light display items. I'm using it to store a bunch of video game accessories that were just cluttered the room where my TV is.It's light enough to be easy to move. The assembly is somewhat modular (so you could, for example, make a couple lower shelving units). As long as you pay attention to the limitations of what it is, it works great and provides a lot of storage space for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars ZERO stars. False photos.
reviews.reviewText: Product is the "theirs" product in the "ours" vs "theirs" picture. Tiny poles, tiny, flimsy plastic connectors, and woven fabric shelves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huge and Super useful!
reviews.reviewText: This has been an amazing help with getting things organized around the house. We have so many shoes in our house that they inevitably add to the Clutter and spill into each room. I installed this in a hallway closet and designated the space exclusively for shoes since it has a nice ventilation at the top and always seems to be a catch-all for junk. Once I built the shoe rack we noticed how much easier it is to keep the house clean and organized. I looked everywhere for a rack with the capacity as much as this one and I'm glad I found this. The assembly did take some time and is a bit tedious but it's not hard to do it just takes a while. This is built similarly to most of the units although the hardware is a bit more heavy duty due to its large size. Really happy with this unit, it's helped a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars For shoe people or family
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I needed. The box came and had detailed instructions how to put it together. It was not difficult but time consuming. The metal is solid and the material that the shelves are made of is durable. I have over the door hangers and the wooden boxes for shoes as well as a box to put in the bottom of the closet. None of them really are made for people who love shoes. I need space and they needed to have space between. Having no defining boarder makes that significantly easier. There really is enough space that this could be perfect for a drop zone for the family all to share. It isn't designed to last twenty years but it is good quality and durable. It is far nicer than most other similar products. If you are a shoe person or looking for some family storage this is the way to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for shoes, not much else
reviews.reviewText: The rack came in quickly and with no issues. The Bepatio shoe rack 9-tier is a large shoe rack made for 36-45 pairs of shoes. It is a stackable shoe shelf that has removable cloth drawers that also with a small metal side 4-hook. The rack has vinyl for the shelving that works ok, not very stable for high heels. The legs snap or clip together and can come apart over time. The rack is very lightweight and made for light use. I like it but wonder how long it will last.
